topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: The Great St Kilda Pier Crab Conspiracy
ideas.premise: Nana's saltwater stories reveal a secret society of St Kilda Pier crabs plotting to overthrow the penguin colony.
ideas.why_funny: Absurd scenario with local landmarks; crab overlords are inherently funny.

ideas.title: Nanna's Secret Mordialloc Mermaid Recipe
ideas.premise: A cooking show where Nana attempts to recreate a traditional Mordialloc mermaid dish, with disastrous (and hilarious) results.
ideas.why_funny: Mermaids as food, Nana's cooking mishaps, and local seafood context.

ideas.title: The Yarra River Monster's Dating Profile
ideas.premise: Nana's stories inspire a dating profile for the mythical Yarra River Monster, highlighting its unique (and gross) qualities.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of a monster with modern dating; Yarra River is notoriously murky.

ideas.title: Brighton Beach Boxes: The Untold Soap Opera
ideas.premise: Nana's tales expose the dramatic lives of the Brighton Beach Boxes, complete with love triangles and property disputes.
ideas.why_funny: Anthropomorphizing inanimate objects; beach box drama is relatable and silly.

ideas.title: The Spirit of the Westgate Bridge
ideas.premise: Nana claims the Westgate Bridge is haunted by the ghost of a disgruntled toll collector who gives terrible traffic advice.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable traffic frustrations mixed with a supernatural, grumpy ghost.
